courseDetails.title: The Motivation Blueprint – Daily Habits for Success & Focus
courseDetails.shortDescription: Train your brain for lasting motivation, master your mindset and build daily habits for success.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Feeling stuck, unmotivated, or tired of starting over?

You're not alone. Most people fail to reach their goals — not because they’re lazy, but because they don’t have a system. In this course, I’ll show you how to break that cycle and build unshakable motivation using simple, science-based strategies.

My name is Alfredo Scarlata, and after 25+ years of coaching people in fitness, mindset, and daily performance, I’ve created a proven blueprint to help you unlock consistent focus, energy, and drive — starting today.


What You’ll Learn

  • Build lasting motivation using proven brain-based strategies

  • Master your mindset and overcome limiting beliefs

  • Create powerful daily habits that lead to consistent success

  • Stop procrastinating and take focused, daily action

  • Develop unstoppable self-discipline and mental strength

  • Structure your day for maximum clarity, energy, and productivity

  • Apply neuroscience to rewire your brain for motivation and drive

  • Build emotional resilience and stay focused in tough times

  • Break the cycle of burnout and stay consistent long-term

  • Design a personal motivation system you can use for life


Requirements

  • No prior knowledge required – this course is designed for beginners and advanced learners

  • A willingness to take action and follow through

  • A journal or digital notebook for exercises and reflection

  • Internet access and a quiet space to focus

  • Optional: Print the worksheets for hands-on implementation


Description

Do you struggle to stay motivated or follow through on your goals?

Do you start strong – but fall back into old patterns within days?

You’re not alone. In fact, most people fail at long-term motivation because they rely on willpower instead of building a system.

This course will change that.


In The Motivation Blueprint, you’ll discover a science-backed system to train your brain, master your mindset, and finally take consistent action — every single day.

You’ll learn how to rewire your mental patterns, build habits that actually stick, and overcome procrastination without forcing yourself. Together, we’ll go step by step through real-life techniques, simple frameworks, and printable tools — so you can finally stay focused, disciplined, and driven.

This isn’t just a motivational boost.

It’s a blueprint for transformation.


You’ll walk away with tools you can use for the rest of your life — in business, health, personal growth, or anything you set your mind to.


Course Structure Overview

Here’s what you’ll learn throughout the modules:

  • How motivation really works – and why most people fail

  • How to reprogram your brain using the power of neuroplasticity

  • The exact method to build and stick to new daily habits

  • How to master your mindset and build mental resilience

  • Practical strategies to stop procrastinating and take massive action

  • Long-term tools to stay on track even when motivation fades


You’ll also receive downloadable tools like:

  • The Daily Motivation Planner

  • The 30-Day Habit Tracker

  • The Weekly Focus Map

  • And more...


You don’t need to be perfect —

you just need a proven system.

This is that system.
targetAudiences: This course is for anyone ready to break free from procrastination, boost their motivation, and stay consistent every day. It’s ideal for professionals, business owners, creatives, and students who want to sharpen their focus, manage their time better, and achieve long-term success without burning out.

Designed for anyone who wants to take control of their habits, mindset, and productivity. Whether you’re a busy entrepreneur, a student preparing for exams, or simply someone tired of starting and stopping, this course gives you the tools to stay on track and achieve your goals.

Perfect for individuals seeking career advancement, business growth, or personal transformation. This course is tailored for those who want to master their mindset, build daily success habits, and maintain motivation even in challenging times.

For anyone who struggles with procrastination, lack of focus, or inconsistency. If you want to finally follow through on your plans, strengthen your discipline, and create a lifestyle that supports your goals, this course is for you.

courseDetails.title: AI Recruitment: Automatisering & Optimering af HR [DA+]
courseDetails.shortDescription: Automatisering | Sourcing-teknologi | Talentanskaffelse | HR-teknologi | Kandidatopsøgende aktiviteter | ChatGPT |
courseDetails.longDescription:
Kurset “AI i Recruiting og Sourcing” hos Mike Pritula Academy er designet til at udstyre HR-professionelle, rekrutteringskonsulenter og sourcere med den viden og de færdigheder, der kræves for effektivt at integrere kunstig intelligens i deres rekrutteringsprocesser. Ved at udnytte AI-værktøjer kan deltagerne øge effektiviteten, tiltrække kandidater af høj kvalitet og bevare en konkurrencemæssig fordel i talent acquisition.


Hvad du vil lære:

• AI-muligheder og -tendenser i rekruttering og sourcing: Forståelse af kunstig intelligens og dens rolle i moderne rekruttering, inkl. de nyeste tendenser, innovationer og succesfulde cases.

• Optimering af jobtekster og billeder med AI: Sådan hjælper AI med at skabe og forfine jobbeskrivelser, analysere og forbedre jobannoncers tiltrækningskraft samt automatisk generere optimerede billeder.

• Automatiseret kandidatvalg: Opdag hvordan AI forbedrer søgning og udvælgelse af kandidater med værktøjer og algoritmer til automatisk matching og integration med ATS.

• Automatisering af sourcing og kommunikation: Udforsk AI-værktøjer til automatisering af kandidat sourcing, kommunikation og personaliserede beskeder for at øge engagement og responsrater.

• Kandidatvurdering og interviewanalyse: Forstå brugen af AI til evaluering af kompetencer, gennemførelse og analyse af interviews samt brug af transskriptions- og evalueringsværktøjer.

• Styrkelse af employer branding og recruitment marketing: Lær hvordan AI kan forbedre employer branding, analysere kandidatinteraktioner og automatisere marketingstrategier.


Kursusprogram:

1. AI-muligheder og -tendenser i rekruttering og sourcing


  • Introduktion til AI og dens rolle i moderne rekruttering.

  • Overblik over de nyeste tendenser og innovationer.

  • Eksempler på succesfuld AI-anvendelse.

  • Potentielle risici og udfordringer.

  • Fremtidige forventninger og forudsigelser.


2. Arbejde med jobtekster og billeder


  • Hvordan AI hjælper med at skabe og optimere jobbeskrivelser.

  • Brug af AI til at analysere og forbedre jobannoncer.

  • Automatisk skabelse og optimering af billeder.

  • Praktiske eksempler og værktøjer.

  • Anbefalinger til effektive jobannoncer.


3. Automatiseret kandidatvalg


  • Hvordan AI forbedrer søge- og udvælgelsesprocessen.

  • Værktøjer og algoritmer til automatisk matching.

  • Integration med ATS.

  • Cases med AI i udvælgelse.

  • Strategier og best practices.


4. Automatisering af sourcing og kommunikation


  • AI-værktøjer til sourcing.

  • Plugins og værktøjer til bedre kommunikation.

  • Automatisering af e-mail-sekvenser.

  • Eksempler på effektiv kommunikation.

  • Grundlæggende om personaliserede beskeder.


5. Kandidatvurdering og interviewanalyse


  • Anvendelse af AI til kompetencevurdering.

  • AI-teknologier i interviews.

  • Automatiske transskriptions- og analyseværktøjer.

  • Objektive vurderingsmetoder.

  • Sådan undgås bias i evaluering.


6. Employer branding og recruitment marketing med AI


  • AI’s rolle i styrkelse af employer brand.

  • Forbedring af kandidatinteraktioner.

  • Automatisering og optimering af marketing.

  • Eksempler på successtrategier.

  • Planlægning og måling af kampagner.


Kursusfordele:

• Ekspertundervisning: Lær fra Mike Pritula, en erfaren HR-leder med stor ekspertise i AI.

• Fleksibel læring: Seks optagede lektioner i dit eget tempo.

• Praktisk anvendelse: Opgaver med personlig feedback.

• Interaktivt fællesskab: Q&A-chat til diskussion og erfaringsudveksling.

• Certificering: Diplom efter afslutning, der styrker dine professionelle kompetencer.


Hvem bør deltage:

• Recruiters og sourcere: For dem, der ønsker at følge med AI-udviklingen i rekruttering.

• HR-specialister: Ønsker at øge effektiviteten i talent acquisition.

• Talent Acquisition Managers: Ledende profiler, der vil optimere rekrutteringsprocesser og styrke employer brand med AI.


Ved at mestre AI i recruiting og sourcing kan du accelerere dine rekrutteringsprocesser, tiltrække top-talenter og fastholde en stærk konkurrencefordel. Tilmeld dig nu for at løfte dine recruitment-strategier!


Dette kursus indeholder brug af kunstig intelligens. Det sikrer banebrydende indsigter og de nyeste metoder.

Dette kursus indeholder en kampagne.
targetAudiences: Dette kursus er for rekrutteringsansvarlige, HR-medarbejdere, talentanskaffelseseksperter og ansættelseschefer, der ønsker at integrere AI i deres rekrutteringsproces. Det er også ideelt for virksomhedsejere, start-up-grundlæggere og alle, der er interesserede i at udnytte AI-værktøjer til at automatisere og optimere ansættelsesstrategier. Uanset om du er nybegynder eller erfaren rekrutteringsansvarlig, vil dette kursus hjælpe dig med at holde dig på forkant i den stadigt udviklende verden inden for AI-drevet rekruttering.

courseDetails.title: Master Course on Critical Thinking Skills & Decision Making
courseDetails.shortDescription: Breakthrough Critical Thinking Strategies for Revolutionary Decision Making for Leaders, Managers, and everyone !
courseDetails.longDescription:
Achieving excellence in decision-making, critical thinking and problem-solving is crucial for leaders, managers and anyone striving for success in today's world. Even the most experienced leaders in top-tier organizations can fall victim to flawed, irrational and noisy decisions, leading to costly consequences that affect business results and organizational culture.


That's where this course comes in...


  • Explore the key characteristics of critical thinkers and learn to distinguish between facts and assumptions.

  • Understand and mitigate biases, analyze cause-and-effect relationships and identify common logical fallacies.

  • Develop skills to define issues, draw sound conclusions and evaluate evidence accurately.

  • Recognize and avoid deceptive statistics, embrace flexible decision-making and apply critical thinking to real-world scenarios.

  • Enhance your ability to think critically and make informed decisions, elevating your personal and professional effectiveness.

  • Elevate your ability to think critically and make well-informed decisions.

  • This course is designed to provide you with practical tools and techniques to enhance your critical thinking skills and apply them effectively in your personal and professional life.

This course is perfect for business managers, leaders, leadership and management students, and anyone eager to become a more informed, influential, and effective decision-maker.


Filled with practical examples and insights, this course provides a thorough understanding of all aspects of decision-making and critical thinking.


Take your leadership and management skills to the next level!


Some images and videos courtesy of Google, Canva, Pixabay, Pexels and FreePik.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to improve their Critical Thinking and Problem Solving Skills
Graduate and Post-graduate Management and Leadership students
Anyone who wants to improve the quality of their Judgements and Decisions

Current, Future, Potential and Aspiring Leaders and Managers, in any field

courseDetails.title: Executive Diploma in Business Management
courseDetails.shortDescription: MTF Institute Diploma in Business Management, Leadership, Entrepreneurship, Business Development, Strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: Executive Diploma in Business Management


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


The Executive Diploma in Business Management is a program designed to equip aspiring business managers and professionals with the essential skills, knowledge, and strategies to succeed in today's dynamic business environment. With a curriculum meticulously crafted to cover a wide range of business management topics, this program serves as a stepping stone for individuals aspiring to enhance their careers or venture into entrepreneurship.


Importance of Business Management Education


For Companies:

Effective business management is the cornerstone of organizational success. Companies require skilled managers who can steer the ship towards growth and sustainability. A well-trained business manager possesses the ability to make strategic decisions, manage resources efficiently, navigate challenges, and adapt to changing market conditions. Such managers contribute to improved operational efficiency, innovation, employee morale, and overall profitability.


For Managers:

Business management education is pivotal for professionals seeking to advance their careers. It provides them with the tools to take on leadership roles, make informed decisions, and drive positive outcomes. As managers climb the corporate ladder, they encounter diverse challenges that demand a solid understanding of business principles, communication skills, strategic thinking, and problem-solving abilities. A well-rounded education empowers managers to tackle complex situations with confidence.


Course Plan Overview:


Business and Business Management:

The program kicks off with an exploration of the fundamental concepts of business and business management. Participants gain insights into the broader economic landscape, the role of businesses in society, and the basic principles that govern successful management practices.


Types of Business Managers:

Understanding the various roles within the realm of business management is essential. This section delves into the diverse responsibilities of business managers, ranging from project managers to department heads, and provides insights into the skill sets required for each role.


Role of the Business Manager:

Participants delve into the multifaceted role of a business manager as a leader, decision-maker, and coordinator. This module examines the intricacies of strategic planning, resource allocation, team management, and effective communication.


Everyday Work of the Business Manager:

Participants are exposed to real-world scenarios that business managers encounter daily.


Development of the Business Manager:

Personal and professional growth is crucial for business managers. This module covers self-management, leadership development, continuous learning, and adapting to industry trends, ensuring that participants remain effective and agile leaders.


Challenges of Business Management:

Managing a business is not without its challenges. Participants explore common hurdles such as change management, competition, and ethical dilemmas. They also learn strategies to mitigate these challenges and turn them into opportunities.


Key Metrics and Frameworks of Business Management:

Measurement is integral to management. This module introduces participants to key performance indicators and other frameworks that assist in evaluating business performance and guiding strategic decisions.


In a rapidly evolving business landscape, the Executive Diploma in Business Management stands as a guide for individuals seeking to excel as managers or entrepreneurs. By addressing a wide spectrum of topics, from foundational business principles to advanced crisis management strategies, the program equips participants with the skills and knowledge necessary to thrive in their professional endeavors. Whether they're climbing the corporate ladder or embarking on an entrepreneurial journey, graduates of this program are well-prepared to make strategic decisions, lead teams, and contribute meaningfully to the success of their organizations.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any who want to build a career at business or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.title: Holistic Health, Happiness & Emotional Well-Being Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Unlocking Balance : Cultivating Inner Peace and Emotional Resilience for a Balanced Life
courseDetails.longDescription:
Health and wellness are often seen as the absence of illness. However, through the lens of Ayurveda—an ancient science of well-being—true wellness is the perfect balance of body, mind, spirit, and emotional well-being. Ayurveda emphasizes emotional health and happiness as key elements of holistic wellness, helping to align your mind and body for deep, lasting transformation.


This course introduces you to simple Ayurvedic practices that not only improve physical health but also nurture emotional well-being, vital during times of stress or uncertainty. courseDetails.title: Storytelling Masterclass - Business Storytelling for Leaders
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Art and Science of Storytelling to influence, persuade and inspire others with step by step practical sessions
courseDetails.longDescription:
Storytelling has the power to engage, influence, teach and inspire listeners. That’s the reason I strongly advocate the professionals to build a storytelling culture and make storytelling the heart of their leadership and communication skills. There’s an art to telling a good story, and we all know a good story when we hear one. But there’s also a science behind the art of storytelling.

Confusing!!

Whether Storytelling is an art that can be learnt or a science that can be reproduced or is it both?

“Researchers have found that the human brain has a natural affinity for narrative construction,” science journalist Benedict Carey wrote in New York Times Magazine. “People tend to remember facts more accurately if they encounter them in a story rather than in a list, studies find; and they rate legal arguments as more convincing when built into narrative tales rather than on legal precedent.”

Take for example, you have attended a long strategic meet where lots of facts and figures are presented with some stories here and there. When asked, the participants afterwards, just 5% could recite a statistic while 63% remembered the story.

Research also shows our brains are not hard-wired to understand logic or retain facts for very long. Our brains are wired to understand and retain stories.

Storytelling is about the exchange of ideas, about growth – and that’s learning. That’s why I believe that it’s important that we embed storytelling in our corporate cultures and in our businesses. If you’re trying to engage, influence, teach, or inspire others, you should be telling or listening to a story, and encouraging others to tell a story with you. You’ll have plenty of science to back you up.

This course help businesses/executives like yours to connect people through stories. We show you how to discover, craft and tell stories that move people. As a result, you make decisions faster and take action.

Through this course participants will learn to find their authentic voice as a leader, refine their message and craft their stories. They will discover their innate charisma so that they can inspire and move their people into action.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to improve their ability to become aware of and tell their own stories within a business context.
Anyone who wish to be an impactful leader and improve their leadership skills and their ability to communicate ideas and engage staff in developing new behaviours.
This course is from any business Professional, from a Manager to Leaders to CXO's.

Candidate Experience is no longer a “nice-to-have.” It’s the backbone of every successful hiring strategy. In a world where top talent has more choices than ever, your hiring process is your brand — and your competitive edge.


This course is your all-in-one system to redesign how candidates perceive your company — from first contact to onboarding. You’ll go far beyond theory: each class includes homework with personal feedback, case studies, AI tools, and ready-made templates.


Course programme

The course is recorded, with homework check and chatting


Recorded class with a feedback on the homework

Class 1: Introduction to Candidate Experience

• What is Candidate Experience and why it is critical

• The business and brand implications of a poor experience

• Overview of the Candidate Journey and real case studies


Class 2: Structure and stages of the selection process

• From first contact to onboarding

• Designing a Candidate Journey Map

• AI tools for automating initial steps and interview scheduling


Class 3: Communication, support and engagement

• Candidate Care at every stage

• Best practices for tone, channels, and timing

• Using AI for personalized communication


Class 4: Interviews: questions, inclusion, training

• Designing inclusive and effective interview questions

• Training interviewers and using AI simulators

• Avoiding bias and ensuring fairness


Class 5: Technology and Analytics in the Candidate Experience

• ATS, chatbots, and feedback platforms

• Metrics: CSAT, NPS, Time-to-Response

• AI dashboards and predictive analytics


Class 6: Improvement and company culture

• Using feedback to improve experience

• Integrating culture into hiring

• Case: How Unilever uses AI in high-volume hiring


Don’t miss your chance to design a candidate experience that impresses, converts, and retains top talent. Enrol now and build a hiring process your candidates — and your hiring team — will love.

This course contains the use of artificial intelligence. It ensures cutting-edge insights and the latest practices.

This course contains a promotion.
targetAudiences: Recruiters looking to improve every stage of the candidate journey
HR professionals responsible for hiring and employer branding
Talent acquisition and Candidate Care specialists
HRBPs and HRDs building or auditing recruitment processes
Team leads and managers who participate in interviews
Anyone involved in shaping the company’s reputation with candidates

courseDetails.longDescription:
En el panorama empresarial actual, la integración de los Sistemas de Información de Recursos Humanos (HRIS) y tecnologías digitales es clave para aumentar la eficiencia, asegurar el cumplimiento normativo y lograr un impacto estratégico en Recursos Humanos. Este curso te prepara para implementar, gestionar y optimizar soluciones HRIS, al tiempo que automatizas procesos clave de RRHH para liberar tiempo y centrarte en iniciativas estratégicas.


Guiado por el experto en la industria Mike Pritula, el programa aborda en profundidad sistemas como HRIS, HRMS, LMS, TMS y chatbots de RRHH para revolucionar las funciones del área e impulsar el rendimiento organizacional.


Lo que aprenderás:

• Fundamentos de automatización y HRIS:

Comprende los principios básicos de automatización en RRHH e implementa procesos clave como nómina, control de asistencia, vacaciones y reportes de cumplimiento.


• Sistemas de seguimiento de candidatos (ATS):

Explora cómo integrar ATS dentro de HRIS para automatizar reclutamiento, análisis, evaluación y onboarding de candidatos.


• Automatización de gestión del rendimiento:

Implementa herramientas como OKRs, reuniones 1:1, evaluaciones de desempeño y feedback 360° integradas en HRIS.

6. Chatbots y IA en soluciones HRIS

7. Reportes y analítica avanzada con HRIS

Por qué elegir este curso:

courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the Car Repair from Beginner to Professional Level ! Car Mechanic, Car Tuning, Electrician, Automotive Engineering
courseDetails.longDescription:
*Get the Official Certificate after Completing the Course

Are you tired of constantly being stuck in a dead-end job with no room for growth or advancement? If so, now is the time to take control of your future and invest in your career. With online car repair training, you can become a skilled auto mechanic in just a few short months and kickstart your journey to a successful and fulfilling career !


You are probably taking this course for one of two reasons. Either you are preparing yourself to enter into the field of automotive service, or you are expanding your skills to include automotive electrical systems. In either case, congratulations on selecting one of the most fast-paced segments of the automotive industry. Working with the electrical systems can be challenging, yet very rewarding; however, it can also be very frustrating at times. For many people, learning electrical systems can be a struggle. It is my hope that I am able to present the course to you in such a manner that you will not only understand electrical systems, but will excel at it. There are many ways the theory of electricity can be explained, and many metaphors can be used. Some compare electricity to a water flow, while others explain it in a purely scientific fashion. Everyone learns differently. I am presenting electrical theory in a manner that I hope will be clear and concise. If you do not fully comprehend a concept, then it is important to discuss it with your instructor. Electricity is somewhat abstract; so if you do have questions, be sure to ask me in Udemy ask section.

Why Become an Electrical System Technician?

In the past, it was possible for technicians to work their entire careers and be able to almost completely avoid the vehicle’s electrical systems. They would specialize in engines, steering/ suspension, or brakes. Today, there is not a system on the vehicle that is immune to the role of electrical circuits. Engine controls, electronic suspension systems, and anti-lock brakes are common on today’s vehicles. Even electrical systems that were once thought of as being simple have evolved to computer controls. Headlights are now pulse-width modulated using high side drivers and will automatically brighten and dim based on the light intensity of oncoming traffic. Today’s vehicles are equipped with twenty or more computers, laser-guided cruise control, sonar park assist, infrared climate control, fiber optics, and radio frequency transponders and decoders. Simple systems have become more computers reliant. For example, the horn circuit on the 2008 Chrysler 300C involves three separate control modules to function. Even the tires have computers involved, with the addition of tire pressure monitoring systems!

Today’s technician must possess a full and complete electrical background to be able to succeed. The future will provide great opportunities for those technicians who have prepared themselves properly and learn more with this Car Mechanic Course.

On the off chance that you're not especially precisely slanted, you might watch the people who are with appreciation, surprise, and irritation since they have something you don't: a comprehension of how things work and how things fit together. Whenever they dismantle something, they can reassemble it how it was. Whenever they say that they need to investigate the hood, they can really get the darn thing open. Furthermore, when they need to change a level, they don't endure ten minutes attempting to sort out which end of the raise is.

Fortunately, you don't need to be brought into the world with a wrench in your grasp to know how to fix things — even things as apparently convoluted as a vehicle. I know; I've been there. The Introduction fills you in regarding my car revelation.

The Best Way to Learn Car Repair is start with this Auto Mechanic Course.

Obviously, the easiest errands can once in a while be the greatest obstacles to survive. All things considered, in the event that you couldn't actually sort out some way to open the hood, how might you check the oil or the coolant level? That is the reason I start this course with the essentials: straightforward positions that you'll have to do over and over — like opening the hood, lifting a vehicle, and replacing a tire. I likewise incorporate guidelines for filling the gas tank yourself (it's less expensive than full-administration), a reliable technique for dismantling anything and assembling it back once more, and security pointers that each technician — experienced and amateur — ought to notice.

courseDetails.title: Compensación y Beneficios en Recompensas Totales [ES+]

courseDetails.longDescription:
Aprende estrategias de Compensación y Beneficios (C&B) para diseñar estructuras salariales competitivas y programas de beneficios que fomenten la retención del talento.


Descripción del curso:


Descubre el poder de la Compensación y los Beneficios (C&B) para atraer, motivar y retener al mejor talento. En un mercado laboral altamente competitivo, contar con programas bien estructurados de compensación y beneficios es clave para la satisfacción, el compromiso y la permanencia de los empleados. Este curso brinda a los profesionales de RRHH las habilidades esenciales para diseñar estructuras salariales competitivas, implementar programas de beneficios y optimizar los sistemas de recompensas alineados con los objetivos empresariales.


Ya seas un especialista en RRHH, un analista de compensaciones o un líder empresarial, este curso te dotará de estrategias avanzadas de compensación, técnicas de administración de beneficios y las últimas tendencias en C&B para mejorar el sistema de recompensas de tu empresa.


Lo que aprenderás:


• Fundamentos de compensación y beneficios (C&B) en RRHH

• Cómo diseñar e implementar estructuras salariales efectivas

• Métodos de evaluación de puestos para escalas salariales justas y competitivas

• El papel del benchmarking de mercado en la estrategia de compensación

• Cómo construir y gestionar programas de beneficios para empleados

• Aspectos legales y de cumplimiento en compensación y beneficios

• Estrategias de C&B para la retención y el compromiso del talento

Programa completo del curso:


Clase 1: Fundamentos de la Compensación – Investigación moderna y estructuras salariales

• Qué pagan las empresas: salario, bonos y recompensas totales

Clase 2: Análisis de puestos para el desarrollo de compensaciones y bonos

• Desarrollo de descripciones de puestos alineadas con esquemas retributivos

• Identificación de factores clave para bonos basados en desempeño

• Cómo el análisis de puestos impacta el benchmarking y escalas salariales


Clase 3: Clasificación de puestos y desarrollo de estructuras salariales

Clase 4: Diseño del sistema de bonificaciones para motivar al personal

• Cómo diseñar un programa de bonificación corporativo orientado a resultados

• Fórmulas listas para estructurar y calcular bonos para el personal

• Alineación de bonos con objetivos de negocio y desempeño individual


Clase 5: Construcción de un sistema eficaz de beneficios para empleados

• Rol de los beneficios en la estrategia de recompensas y retención

• Panorama completo de los diferentes tipos de beneficios laborales

• Estrategias de presupuestación de beneficios para RRHH

• Beneficios flexibles (Plan Cafetería) y cómo implementarlos

• Análisis del impacto de los beneficios en el compromiso y productividad


Clase 6: Estudios de mercado salarial, nómina y presupuestación de beneficios

• Cómo participan las empresas en revisiones de mercado laboral

• Identificación de proveedores confiables de benchmarking salarial

• Ejemplos de informes y bases de datos de estudios salariales

• Cómo interpretar y aplicar encuestas salariales en la planificación de C&B

• Estrategias de presupuestación de nómina y beneficios


Clase 7: Análisis de C&B – Cómo realizar encuestas efectivas

• Cómo analizar compensaciones y beneficios para ser competitivos en el mercado

• Realización de encuestas salariales y de beneficios para obtener insights

• Principales encuestas que ayudan a la toma de decisiones en RRHH

• Evaluación de la eficacia de programas de C&B

• Toma de decisiones basadas en datos para optimizar estructuras salariales


Clase 8: Reconocimiento, bonos de referidos e incentivos adicionales

• Bonos de entrada: cuándo y cómo ofrecerlos de forma efectiva

• Bonos de retención: asegurar talento clave con incentivos estratégicos

• Exploración de otros tipos de bonificaciones para enriquecer la estrategia de C&B



¿A quién va dirigido este curso?

Al finalizar este curso, tendrás una comprensión completa del área de Compensación y Beneficios (C&B) y serás capaz de diseñar estructuras salariales y programas de beneficios competitivos que atraigan y retengan al mejor talento.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Total Rewards 2.0: Estrategias avanzadas para atraer, motivar y retener talento

Total Rewards 2.0 es un curso actualizado en línea diseñado para dotar a los profesionales de RRHH con estrategias avanzadas que permiten atraer, motivar y retener empleados mediante sistemas integrales de recompensas.

Impartido por el experto del sector Mike Pritula, este programa incluye 16 lecciones profundas, ofreciendo un 50 % más de contenido que la versión anterior, con nuevos elementos sobre presupuestación, evaluación y componentes estratégicos de Total Rewards.


Lo que aprenderás:

• Sistema integral de Total Rewards

Comprende todos los componentes: compensación, beneficios, equilibrio vida-trabajo, gestión del desempeño y desarrollo profesional.


• Alineación estratégica

Desarrolla estrategias de recompensas alineadas con los objetivos del negocio y la cultura organizacional.


• Diseño de compensaciones

Domina fundamentos como evaluación de puestos, revisión de mercado salarial y estructuras de remuneración.


• Beneficios y calidad de vida

Explora beneficios clásicos, planes flexibles y medidas para mejorar el bienestar del personal.


• Recompensas por desempeño

Aprende a vincular la compensación con indicadores como KPI, MBO y OKR para impulsar la productividad.


• Presupuestación y evaluación

Gestiona presupuestos de compensación y beneficios, y mide el impacto real de tu sistema Total Rewards.


Programa del curso:


1. Introducción a Total Rewards

Visión general de los componentes y del rol del especialista en este campo.


2. Desarrollo de la estrategia de Total Rewards

Vinculación con objetivos de negocio y cultura organizacional.


3. Diseño de elementos de Total Rewards

Análisis, diseño, implementación y comunicación del sistema.


4. Fundamentos de compensación y evaluación de puestos

Análisis de puestos, estructuras salariales y alineación con el mercado.


5. Revisión de mercado salarial

Comparación salarial externa y toma de decisiones basada en datos.


6. Jerarquización de puestos y estructuras de pago

Diseño de niveles y bandas salariales base.


7. Compensación en ventas

Diseño de sistemas de recompensas específicos para equipos comerciales.


8. Compensación de ejecutivos y recompensas globales

Remuneración a altos directivos y enfoque internacional.


9. Vinculación de pago y desempeño

Integración de métricas de rendimiento con estructuras de pago.


10. Incentivos en efectivo

Esquemas de incentivos: por referidos, retención y más.


11. Beneficios y equilibrio vida-trabajo

Planificación de beneficios y promoción de bienestar.


12. Presupuesto de Total Rewards

Distribución de recursos entre sueldos, incentivos y beneficios.


13. Evaluación de la efectividad del sistema

Auditoría y medición del impacto organizacional.


14. Programas de reconocimiento

Diseño de estrategias para premiar logros individuales y colectivos.


15. Total Rewards y marca empleadora

Why learn C programming language?

Despite its simplicity, C remains one of the most powerful and enduring languages, consistently ranking among the top programming languages worldwide for over 40 years. Learning C provides a foundational mental model of computer operations, benefiting one's proficiency in languages like C++, Java, or C#.   • C's foundational role in programming.
